bug.description:
Hi, I am creating demonstrations for use in imitation learning. I noticed that the meta data on my demo files always says vector observation size: 1 (should be 212 in this case). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22680369/72227086-62f4e200-3590-11ea-956c-fe509637a278.png></denchmark-link>
To test this I tried the example scenes and had the same result with pyramids and walker? Does anyone have any ideas what might cause this? Brain parameters: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22680369/72227118-c121c500-3590-11ea-8b55-e4c4fba61c96.png></denchmark-link>
System: mlagents 0.12.1, Windows 10, Unity 2019.2.0f1

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mnsmuts>@mnsmuts</denchmark-link> , This is a known bug in the display of demonstration files. Sorry for the trouble...
OK thanks, so just the display, not the actual demonstration?
Right, just the display is incorrect.
